subsection_name: benh-vong-mac-tieu-duong.json_4_Who is at risk of getting the disease?
subsection_content:
Any diabetic patient is at risk of diabetic retinopathy, not excluding type 1 diabetes or type 2 diabetes. Diabetics are at higher risk of diabetic retinopathy if they have certain conditions. following factor. (3)
People with long-term diabetes; Gestational diabetes.; High blood sugar levels that are not well controlled; High Blood Pressure.; High cholesterol.
